name: knight-bash
description:
Politely send back unwanted gifts from the rival kingdom. "No, no, you can have the dead pig. I insist." Jab these useless things straight to your opponent's castle gates.

Controls

Player 1

WASD - movement

Spacebar - jab with spear

R - place bomb

Player 2

Arrow keys - movement

Mouse 1 - jab with spear

Mouse 2 - place bomb
